data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rosa, Paolo, Wei, Na-sen, Xu, Zai-fu (2017): One new species and three new records of Chrysis Linnaeus from China (Hymenoptera, Chrysididae). ZooKeys 669: 65-88, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.669.12398, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.669.12398
